channel.title: Favorite MMO?
channel.description:
Mines WoW, then rift.
(excluding RS)
Whats yours? I need some ideas!

item.title: Favorite MMO?
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:43, topic:427395”][quote author=judostar1 link=topic=530091.msg3877552#msg3877552 date=1325785203]
Club penguin was rather fun until I was about 8 or 9, I tend to look at what they did to club penguin but ti’s complete bullshit now, ~75% of all the content is for members.
[/quote]
I used to play it too! I had members once in my time of playing, it’s stupid how you can’t use any items if you don’t have members.[/quote]

agreed.

Read full topic

item.title: Favorite MMO?
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

judostar1:

Club penguin was rather fun until I was about 8 or 9, I tend to look at what they did to club penguin but ti’s complete bullshit now, ~75% of all the content is for members.

I used to play it too! I had members once in my time of playing, it’s stupid how you can’t use any items if you don’t have members.

item.title: Favorite MMO?
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

RS, WoW, and Club penguin.

Even though I don’t play WoW anymore, I had a 3 level 85 accs. (Death knight, shaman and warrior)

Club penguin was rather fun until I was about 8 or 9, I tend to look at what they did to club penguin but ti’s complete bullshit now, ~75% of all the content is for members.

Read full topic

@ziplock wrote:

Well game development that complex goes way over my head.

Read full topic

item.title: Favorite MMO?
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:39, topic:427395”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=530091.msg3871886#msg3871886 date=1325391228]

Other than Runescape, my favorite would be Endless Online. I haven’t played it in years, but it was kind of fun when I did play it. I haven’t really tried any other MMO’s though. I might try World of Warcraft once my RS membership runs out.

I loved EO back in the days before the account deletion and massive downtime. I was only lvl 30 or so, but I remember having the guitar and would play it like a homeless person on the streets.
[/quote]

Yes, this was my favorite childhood MMO. Sadly Vult-R wasn’t to great with client security, which ultimately killed the game because all of the client hackers. Oddly enough I can’t find another MMO like it.[/quote]Why not develop something like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Favorite MMO?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:21, topic:427395”][quote author=vManlyMan link=topic=530091.msg3871236#msg3871236 date=1325358546]
Other than Runescape, my favorite would be Endless Online. I haven’t played it in years, but it was kind of fun when I did play it. I haven’t really tried any other MMO’s though. I might try World of Warcraft once my RS membership runs out.
[/quote]

I loved EO back in the days before the account deletion and massive downtime. I was only lvl 30 or so, but I remember having the guitar and would play it like a homeless person on the streets.[/quote]

Yes, this was my favorite childhood MMO. Sadly Vult-R wasn’t to great with client security, which ultimately killed the game because all of the client hackers. Oddly enough I can’t find another MMO like it.

Read full topic

item.title: Favorite MMO?
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:21, topic:427395”][quote author=vManlyMan link=topic=530091.msg3871236#msg3871236 date=1325358546]
Other than Runescape, my favorite would be Endless Online. I haven’t played it in years, but it was kind of fun when I did play it. I haven’t really tried any other MMO’s though. I might try World of Warcraft once my RS membership runs out.
[/quote]

I loved EO back in the days before the account deletion and massive downtime. I was only lvl 30 or so, but I remember having the guitar and would play it like a homeless person on the streets.[/quote]

Isn’t lvl 30 VERY high for EO? I had just gotten to 12 or so before I stopped playing.

EDIT: Can’t remember my login so I’m goign to make a new account and see if it’s any fun anymore.

EDIT2: It won’t letme do anything besides watch the credits at the main menu. :\

Read full topic

item.title: Favorite MMO?
item.dc:creator: @Dunder_Mifflin1 Dunder Mifflin
item.description:
@Dunder_Mifflin1 wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:20, topic:427395”][quote author=Dunder Mifflin link=topic=530091.msg3871462#msg3871462 date=1325371679]

Skyrim is a MMO? o.o

I’ve played WoW, RS, Maplestory, Club Penguin, Neopets, etc etc

The only ones that aren’t shit are the first two. Maplestory is seriously just a money hog. Club penguin has no content but I guess was ok when I was younger. Neopets was also fun when I was younger too, but it lacks any action at all

EDIT - A maplestory private server, chill? That sounds better than the real one, but I still doubt I’d play. Sprite-based arent really my favorite types of game.

Currently I play WoW with my brother, refer a friend means you get 3X xp when you play together. We got level 80 in like 2 and a half weeks, but I doubt I could stand leveling at 1x for more than a few days.

Just que for dungeons all day, me and my friend are doing it nolife right now cause tis winter break. We got level 30 in one day, on our way to 80 atm
[/quote]
I no life it all the time, tis why i have 5 85s with one on the way.[/quote]
I only have two 0.0. But a dwarf paladin on the way to 85 via raf
. Add me real I’d gamingfool@rocketmail.com . And I’ve been playing four years, guess I suck

Read full topic

I loved EO back in the days before the account deletion and massive downtime. I was only lvl 30 or so, but I remember having the guitar and would play it like a homeless person on the streets.

I’ve played WoW, RS, Maplestory, Club Penguin, Neopets, etc etc

The only ones that aren’t shit are the first two. Maplestory is seriously just a money hog. Club penguin has no content but I guess was ok when I was younger. Neopets was also fun when I was younger too, but it lacks any action at all

EDIT - A maplestory private server, chill? That sounds better than the real one, but I still doubt I’d play. Sprite-based arent really my favorite types of game.

Currently I play WoW with my brother, refer a friend means you get 3X xp when you play together. We got level 80 in like 2 and a half weeks, but I doubt I could stand leveling at 1x for more than a few days.
[/quote]

Just que for dungeons all day, me and my friend are doing it nolife right now cause tis winter break. We got level 30 in one day, on our way to 80 atm :)[/quote]
